Articles.Content:
Hi, my name's Shinji-The-Kerbonaut and I'm new to the forums.

I've only worked with Enjin and XenForo in the past, and vBulletin is very confusing (I don't even know how to get a signature or an avatar.).

Here's some facts about my KSP experiences:

Bought the game on May 20, 2013.

Proud (ab)user of the HyperEdit Plugin.

Somewhat good with rocket physics

Can't construct a big, good rocket (I can only get around medium size...big = external parts fall off, boom goes everything and then I give the game a look.)

Sorry if these questions might be dumb, but:

1. How do I change/upload my/an avatar?

2. How do I make a signature?

Sorry, I'm not used to vBulletin.
Shortly after you submit your 5th post, the forum software will give you permission to customize your profile.

Welcome to the forum!

And can I just say has anyone noticed that Cap Skunky says almost the exact same thing on every welcome message?
You could... but yes, we have.
